faq.question: What do you usually program?
faq.answer: I usually create games using Unity, but sometimes I also create software.

faq.question: Do you take commissions?
faq.answer: No, as much as I would like to, I am not that confident in my skills to take them.

faq.question: Do you draw fan-art?
faq.answer: No. I only draw original characters, and I don't draw the same character more than twice.

faq.question: Why MediBang Paint Pro?
faq.answer: When I first started digital art I tried many drawing software, and out of the bunch, MediBang Paint Pro felt the smoothest to work on.

faq.question: Why digital-art?
faq.answer: I used to draw traditional as well however the convenience of digital is unbeatable.
